main event: Three or four unidentified objects were observed in Klamath, California by a military source over a period of three hours.
interesting points: The report indicated the lights changed colors: red, green, yellow, blue, and orange., The objects exhibited erratic motion as if they were landing., An aircraft (ETHAN 92) was diverted to the area but did not observe anything unusual., The sighting lasted from 0740Z to 1055Z, indicating it was at night., The conclusion suggested that the observed lights could be attributed to stars and planets, specifically Sirius, Capella, and Jupiter.
sighted object: three or four unidentified lights in the sky
